Info.title: Dove Dry Spray Antiperspirant
Info.description: Shake, Spray, and it's dry! Dove Dry Spray Antiperspirant goes on instantly dry while leaving your skin residue free–and it's really easy to use!

Info.title: Baby Dove
Info.description: Introducing New Baby Dove Calming Nights Wash & Lotion,with a calming scent and 100% skin natural nutrients. It’s recommended by 4 in 5 parents for a calming sleep routine.
